attributes.action: Roll out a Right to Buy scheme for all housing association tenants
attributes.additional_details: I have been living in my home for 20 years have paid more then half off the current market asking price in rent, and therefore would like to have the right to own my property which I currently live. This would make for an easier life and secure my family future.
attributes.background: I want the Government to roll out a national Right to Buy scheme for all housing association tenants, along the lines of the scheme piloted in the Midlands in 2018, so that housing association tenants can buy their property at a discounted rate.
